name: The Deadline
text: You had your chance, you took your time. Now time's run out, a costly crime…

name: The Debt
text: You borrowed hope, you spent it fast. The bill is due, it's come at last…

name: The Missed Call
text: You let it ring, you turned away. Now silence answers every day.

name: The Fork
text: Left or right, you had to choose. You took them both, and still you lose.

name: The Mirror
text: You sought the truth in glass and light, but saw yourself and felt the fright.

name: The Reciept
text: You paid in haste, ignored the cost. Now count the things you've truly lost.

name: The Laugh
text: They laughed at you, you laughed back. Now laughter's gone, it's all going black.

name: The Knot
text: You tied your fate with tangled thread. Now every tug just fills with dread.

name: The Gift
text: Wrapped in ribbon, sealed with charm, but deep inside, it means you harm.

name: The Shortcut
text: You rushed ahead to save some time, prepare to pay for skipping the line.

name: The Echo
text: Your words return, but not the same – they twist, they turn, they call your name.

name: The Choice
text: You made your pick, the die was cast, too late to run, the spell is fast.
